Chinese.name: 音视频转码-Intel版
Chinese.description: 使用COS+云函数+CFS（可选），快速构建音视频转码服务；此版本的ffmpeg是经过Intel优化的，在Intel CPU下能有更好的效率表现。
Chinese.attention: 1. 本示例需要在环境变量配置COS的bucket信息，并设置COS触发器或者API网关触发器配合使用；2. 另外在函数配置中会使用运行角色来操作COS资源，需要确保有cos bucket的对象上传权限；3. 源文件所在bucket需要设置为公有读私有写。4. 此模版用于生产环境前请先自行编写业务代码。

English.name: TranscodeIntel
English.description: This example demonstrates triggering a cloud function from COS or a gateway, obtaining the source file download address, and transcoding based on ffmpeg using HTTP read stream, and this ffmpeg is intel version which will more fast than before.
English.attention: This example needs to configure the COS bucket information in the environment variable, and set the COS trigger or API gateway trigger to cooperate with.
